Name: China Commercial Credit, Inc
Description: China Commercial Credit, Inc., through its subsidiaries, operates as a microcredit company in the People's Republic of China. It provides direct loans, including secured loans comprising guarantee-backed loans and collateral-backed loans. China Commercial Credit, Inc. also offers financial guarantee services to third party lenders; and financial leasing services. It serves small-to-medium sized enterprises, farmers, and individuals in Wujiang, Jiangsu Province. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Suzhou, the People's Republic of China.
